h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Violet Spider
content: She'll often follow up her webbing with a poison attack, sending out a similar salvo of five poison projectiles that will seek you out rather quickly. The good news is you'll be able to use your staff spin to repel these heat-seeking gobs of poison, rather than having to dodge at the last moment.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Violet Spider'.
The content is as follows:
She'll often follow up her webbing with a poison attack, sending out a similar salvo of five poison projectiles that will seek you out rather quickly. The good news is you'll be able to use your staff spin to repel these heat-seeking gobs of poison, rather than having to dodge at the last moment.
